languages.text: "Если это можно так назвать. Желаешь превратиться в образину, которая нас тут встретила? Сомневаюсь".
"If one could call it that. Would you like to become a bloated husk like the one we encountered? I doubt it."
languages.original_text: "Если это можно так назвать. Желаешь превратиться в образину, которая нас тут встретила? Сомневаюсь".

traits.locale_text: "Assuming it can be called such. Would you like to become an bloated husk that we encountered? This I doubt."
"Assuming it can be called such. Would you like to become an bloated husk that we encountered? This I doubt."
"If one could call it that. Would you like to become a bloated husk like the one we encountered? I doubt it."
"If one could call it that. Would you like to become a bloated husk like the one we encountered? I doubt it."
"If one could call it that. Would you like to become a bloated husk like the one we encountered? I doubt it."

languages.text: “如果你觉得那样也算是永生，那就算吧。你真的打算变成我们刚刚遇到的那个臃肿的玩意儿吗？我对此表示怀疑。”
languages.original_text: "If one could call it that. Would you like to become a bloated husk like the one we encountered? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: “如果你觉得那样也算是永生，那就算吧。你真的打算变成我们刚刚遇到的那个臃肿的玩意儿吗？我对此表示怀疑。”

languages.text: 「そう呼んでもいいんであればな。お前も膨らんだ殻になりたいのか？俺たちが遭遇したやつみたいな？それはないな」
languages.original_text: "If one could call it that. Would you like to become a bloated husk like the one we encountered? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: 「そう呼んでもいいんであればな。お前も膨らんだ殻になりたいのか？俺たちが遭遇したやつみたいな？それはないな」

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas si l'on peut vraiment parler d'immortalité. Aimeriez-vous devenir une enveloppe boursouflée comme celle que nous avons croisée ? J'en doute. »
languages.original_text: "If one could call it that. Would you like to become a bloated husk like the one we encountered? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas si l'on peut vraiment parler d'immortalité. Aimeriez-vous devenir une enveloppe boursouflée comme celle que nous avons croisée ? J'en doute. »

languages.text: «Bueno, si se le puede llamar así. ¿Quieres convertirte en un cascarón hinchado como el que vimos antes? Lo dudo».
languages.original_text: "If one could call it that. Would you like to become a bloated husk like the one we encountered? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: «Bueno, si se le puede llamar así. ¿Quieres convertirte en un cascarón hinchado como el que vimos antes? Lo dudo».

languages.text: "Falls man das so nennen kann. Möchtet Ihr eine aufgedunsene Hülle werden wie die, der wir begegnet sind? Ich bezweifle es."
languages.original_text: "If one could call it that. Would you like to become a bloated husk like the one we encountered? I doubt it."

traits.locale_text: "Falls man das so nennen kann. Möchtet Ihr eine aufgedunsene Hülle werden wie die, der wir begegnet sind? Ich bezweifle es."
